title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 172.1 - Weekly allowance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 172.1 - Weekly allowance

State Regulations

Every child may receive as compensation for work performed in
housekeeping services, facility maintenance and work training programs in all

Division for Youth residential programs, for which compensation is otherwise
not being provided, a weekly allowance up to $1 per day for up to seven days a
week provided that funds are available therefor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
172.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
